title: Manage an Empty Container Depot
description: A trucking company wants to drop off an empty container at the port's empty depot. The operator must process it.

tasks.description: Receive the truck at the empty depot gate and identify the container number and shipping line owner.
tasks.expected_outcome: Operator identifies the container and its owner (e.g., Maersk).

tasks.description: Verify that the shipping line is currently accepting returns of that container type at this depot.
tasks.expected_outcome: Operator confirms that Maersk is accepting 40' dry containers.

tasks.description: Assign a stacking location in the empty yard and instruct the driver where to go.
tasks.expected_outcome: The driver is given a location, and the empty container is added to the depot's inventory.
